mapper.insert: INSERT INTO project.order (user_id , store_id, order_price, order_state, order_orderTime, order_num) VALUES (#{user_id}, #{store_id}, #{order_price}, "접수 대기", #{order_orderTime}, #{order_num})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ordermenu om INNER JOIN project.order o ON om.order_num = o.order_num INNER JOIN orderoption oo ON om.orderMenu_id = oo.orderMenu_id WHERE o.store_id = #{store_id}
